title: Congratulating a college graduate
context: Tell a student how proud you are that they finally received their diploma.

content.bestLine: I'm beyond proud of you for earning your diploma!

neutral.text: You must be thrilled to have finished college.
I'm so happy for your achievement.
This is a huge accomplishment for you.
You've worked hard for this moment.
I'm honored to have seen you grow.

informal.text: You did it! I'm so proud of you.
You must be relieved it's over.

formal.text: Your academic achievement is truly commendable.
I offer you my sincerest praise on this occasion.
This milestone marks the beginning of a promising future.
Your perseverance has yielded outstanding results.

patterns.meaning: Expressing pride and happiness for the graduate's achievement.
Acknowledging the completion of the graduate's college education.

dialogs.description: A heartfelt conversation between a parent and their child who just graduated.

lines.speaker: Parent
lines.text: I'm beyond proud of you for earning your diploma!

lines.speaker: Graduate
lines.text: Thanks, Mom. It means a lot coming from you.

dialogs.description: A friend congratulating another friend on their graduation.

lines.speaker: Friend 1
lines.text: Dude, congrats on graduating! We should celebrate.

lines.speaker: Friend 2
lines.text: Absolutely, let's plan something for this weekend.
